        Returns:

        See Also:

      • generateLinearColorSequence

        public static List<Color> generateLinearColorSequence​(List<? extends Color> anchorColors,
                                                      int colorsBetweenAnchors)
        Generate linear color sequence between given stop colors as anchorColors and with colorsBetweenAnchors number of intermediary steps between them.
        Parameters:
        anchorColors - the stop colors
        colorsBetweenAnchors - number of steps between each pair of stop colors
        Returns:
        the list of colors

      • generateLinearColorSequence

        public static List<Color> generateLinearColorSequence​(Color color1,
                                                      Color color2,
                                                      int colorsBetweenAnchors)
        Generate linear color sequence between two given colors.
        Parameters:
        color1 - the first color (to be included in the sequence)
        color2 - the last color (to be included in the sequence)
        colorsBetweenAnchors - number of colors between the two colors
        Returns:
        the list of colors
